name: CAKE INVADERS (itch) (FluoriteGames)
description:
Cake Invaders is a fast paced reflex based point-and-click shooter where the player must recover their baking ingredients from a diverse cast of alien invaders.

IN THE DISTANT FUTURE TWO ALIEN RACES INVADED EARTH

THEY CALLED THEMSELVES THE BLUTIANS AND THE YELLONAUGHTS

THEY KILLED MILLIONS AND DECIMATED THE PLANET

BUT WORST OF ALL THEY TOOK YOUR BAKING INGREDIENTS

IT IS TIME FOR REVENGE

DESTROY THE INVADERS AND COLLECT YOUR INGREDIENTS

MATCH YOUR LASER COLOR TO THEIR COLOR

COLLECT THE COINS THEY DROP

PURCHASE UPGRADES TO BECOME MORE POWERFUL

LMB - SHOOT

RMB  - SWITCH COLOR

Created for Jame Gam #20. The theme was "Two Worlds" and the special item was "The Cake."

Graphics pack used was Kenney 1-Bit-Pack with added additions (cake and sugar bag) by Terrain.

Music track created by Nolan Steinhart.
